projects.title: Pellisambandalu Matrimonial Website
projects.bodyText:
- A platform designed for users to find and connect with potential matrimonial matches.
- Includes user dashboards, settings, matchmaking filters, and an admin panel for managing user activity.
- Features smooth navigation and performance optimization.

projects.title: MyMechanic App
projects.bodyText:
- A mobile app enabling users to book mechanics from nearby mechanic shops.
- Includes separate flows for admins, users, and mechanics for a streamlined experience.
- Features revenue tracking and search filters for mechanics and shops.

projects.title: Learning Management System App
projects.bodyText:
- Multi-tiered application for training new hires, enhancing onboarding and skill acquisition.
- Dynamic video upload/playback and role-based access for admins, managers, team leads, and users.
- Features course management and real-time notifications.

projects.title: GTutor Website
projects.bodyText:
- A platform for students to access notes and practice content.
- Responsive user interface and features for uploading and organizing educational materials.
- Optimized performance and cross-browser compatibility.
